goals: To help students student develop their ability to express themselves in writing essays in English
To help students write various kinds of essays in a well-organized manner
syllabus:
**Course Description:**

This course aims to equip students with fundamental skills to write five-paragraph short essays with different strategies and purposes. In this semester, the course will focus on the following three modes of writing: definition, process analysis, and comparison and contrast. In addition, the course will familiarize students with some editing strategies to enhance writing clarity. Much of the learning will be through in-class discussion, writing assignments, peer-review activities, and one-on-one writing consultation with the instructor.
